description: ApiClient.java defines a utility class for managing API request configurations, specifically retrieving the base URL for network operations. It references environment variables via AppScaffold and serves as a foundation for API interactions across modules like auth, products, cart, and orders.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A helper class providing methods to access API configuration details, mainly the base URL for network requests.

methods.name: getBaseUrl
methods.description: Returns the base URL for API requests, fetched from environment configuration via AppScaffold.
